how to change wine's C:\ drive location?: why do you want to change it? maybe there is an easier way to solve your problem
I want to install half life 2, but it requires to be started from c drive, I do'nt have enough free room at /home

exit all wine using applications .. then copy your ~/.wine directory to another partition that has free space then mount it in your home directory with   sudo mount --bind /path/to/wine_directory ~/.wine/
